name: Rowgen Quickscopes Karl
description: Rowgen and the gang went to the first trial challenge and absolutely rekts Karl

name: Swaaga Raaga
description: A sparking tutorial brought to you by Raaga, but then things go horribly wrong when the loomnartie suddenly appears

name: Charude Buffstorm
description: Charla and Themis went on a mission to steal some doritos from Shida

name: Brave Frontier.exe
description: The salt rage was too much for us players, so the swag summoner memes was infused to the game, only to bring unexpected results

name: How 2 Arena
description: xX_Tillith_Xx teaches you scrubs how to properly play the Brave Frontier Arena in an MLG420 dank way

name: Brave Frontier is Illuminati
description: After years of research, we have proven that this game is not what it seems to be

name: Brave Frontier in a Nutshell
description: Brave Frontier.exe was not enough. The swag summoner went in a second time to meme shit, and invites the Holy Emperor for an animated dank battle

name: Brave Frontier: Swaglord Four
description: The grand finale. Meticulously-crafted cinematic-style vfx and compositing closes the series with 4 legendary swaglords in 3 animated dank battles
